attributes.additional_details: The incompetency of our present Government is shameful. We are sick of u-turns and blatant disregard for the welfare of the majority of British citizens
attributes.background: We, the British public, demand an immediate General Election. Following the resignation of Liz Truss, we have lost all faith in this Government's ability to run our country competently, with integrity and honesty

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
